Lazarus Group, a North Korean hacking crew, drained over $500 million from the game Infinity and sent a big chunk of it through Tornado Cash. articles.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) delivered its best weekly performance in over two months, climbing 4.24% to $1,715.50.       - Bitcoin's value is now at $2,716.50, up from $2.715 a week ago.

articles.title: Chris Burniske Says All It Takes Is One Day for Crypto To Ignite Bullish Reversal ...
articles.author: The Daily Hodl
articles.summary: Venture capitalist Chris Burniske is optimistic about the future of the crypto market. He's starting to see signs of life within longtail cryptocurrencies and altcoins further out the risk zone. He tells his 324,300 followers on the social media platform X that it would only take one day of positive action for the market to suddenly reverse course.

articles.title: Trump-Backed WLFI Invests $343M in Crypto, Faces $109M Loss
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Trump-Backed WLFI Invests $343M in Crypto. It will lose $109M on the investment.      .  ,   and the company's shareholders are: Trump, WlFI, and its investors.

articles.title: Strategy Added 6.9K Bitcoin for $584M, Bringing Stack to 506K Tokens
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Michael Saylor-led Stategy brought its bitcoin stake above 500,000 tokens with additional purchases made last week. The company purchased 6,911 bitcoin for $584.1 million Monday morning. That brought the company's stake to $84,529 per token.

articles.title: Hopeful Surge: Crypto Investment Products Attract $644M Inflows, Ending 5-Week Outflow Winter
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Last week, crypto investment products experienced a whopping $644 million in net inflows, effectively putting an end to a five-week-long cold spell in the crypto market. Investors are injecting significant capital back into digital assets, signaling a potential shift in sentiment.

articles.title: Metaplanet buys more Bitcoin – Target: 10,000 BTC by the end of 2025
articles.author: The Bitcoin News
articles.summary: The Japanese investment firm Metaplanet has increased its Bitcoin holdings by another 150 BTC. The latest acquisition amounted to 1.886 billion yen, equivalent to approximately 12.1 million US dollars at the average price of 12.57 million yen (83,000 US dollars) per Bitcoin.

articles.title: Metaplanet Buys $12.6M in Bitcoin, Boosting Holdings to 3,350 BTC
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Metaplanet's Bitcoin holdings grow to 3,350 BTC. The firm aims to hold 10,000 BTC by the end of 2025 and 21,000 by 2026, and has a target to hold 21,00 BTC by 2027.

articles.title: Bitcoin: 172K BTC acquisition could trigger a bullish trend – How?
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: BTC acquisitions and positive indicators suggest Bitcoin is poised for significant price growth, according to Bitcointalk.com's analysis.    Bitcoin's value is expected to rise by around 50%.   Bitcoins are worth about $10,000 today. Bitcoin's market cap is about $3,000.

articles.title: Bitcoin Price Set To Explode as Global Liquidity Z Score Flashes Buy Signal
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) showed strength over the weekend after a 2.45% rally to the upside. This minor rally aligns with the US stock market's positive outlook and rising global liquidity. With the global liquidity index's Z score flashing a buy signal, Bitcoin price could be set for.

articles.title: Chainlink partners with ADGM to explore blockchain regulation
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Abu Dhabi Global Market has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Chainlink to explore the use of the blockchain technology.      Â   for the first time in the world, a market has signed an agreement with a company that uses it.

articles.title: Bitcoin Selling Pressure Eases Significantly – Potential for Moderate Growth This Week?
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Bitcoin is once again testing the $85K level. The market has yet to see a convincing breakout. Bitcoin needs to break above the $90K mark to shift sentiment back to bullish.  . The current local high is near $87,500, which would be a significant break.

articles.title: Bitcoin's slowness is a feature, not a bug
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: Brendon Sedo is the Initial Contributor at Core DAO. Bitcoin deliberately trades speed and scalability for decentralization and security. This is not an obstacle to the development of the Bitcoin network. Brendon believes that Bitcoin is not a generalist network, but a jack of all trades.

articles.title: PepeX presale to go live as FARTCOIN and SHIB gear up for massive price actions
articles.author: Invezz
articles.summary: Faroin and Shiba inu are ready for the anticipated rally. PepeX will open its presale today and plans to introduce the first AI-powered meme token generator. Bitcoin is holding above $85K and is expected to rise further.

articles.title: Surge of Hope? Crypto Fear & Greed Index Climbs to 45, Still Cautious Market Mood
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Cryptocurrency markets are known for their wild swings. The Crypto Fear and Greed Index is a barometer for crypto sentiment. Recently, the index has shown a notable shift, sparking the current market volatility. It swings between extreme fear and unbridled greed.

articles.title: Crypto News: NFTs May Escape SEC Securities Regulations, Commissioner Peirce Weighs In
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: NFTs may escape SEC Securities Regulations, according to Commissioner Peirce, who is concerned about their security. The post "Crypto News: NFTs May Escape SEC Securities regulations" was republished by CNA on behalf of CNA.

articles.title: Georgia man charged in Danbury kidnapping plot linked to $230M crypto theft
articles.author: News Times
articles.summary: The man is accused of being involved in the August 2024 kidnapping of a Danbury couple whose son was allegedly involved in a multimillion-dollar crypto-heist. He is also accused of involvement in the son's involvement in a multi-million-dollar theft.

articles.title: Telegram crypto wallet adds Litecoin support for all non-U.S. users
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Litecoin is now available in Wallet in Telegram, the crypto wallet that lets users buy it. It's available in the wallet's Telegram app now.   litecoin.com/wallet is the app that allows users to buy Litecoin in Telegram.

articles.title: Bitcoin trading activity cools as market liquidity contracts and investor caution grows
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: Macroeconomic uncertainty is keeping Bitcoin (BTC) in a tight price range. Bitcoin liquidity continues to contract due to declining speculative interest and trading volumes. Large investors' interest needs to return to push Bitcoin out of its current range, according to Bitfinex Alpha.

articles.title: Positive SEC Response: A Promising Step Towards Cryptocurrency Regulation
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: The SEC has responded favorably to a comprehensive report on digital assets. The SEC has signaled a potentially game-changing shift in its approach to digital assets, which could bring more clarity and stability to the often-turbulent cryptocurrency market. The report was published by the SEC's website.

articles.title: The dying coins
articles.summary: Some shopkeepers refuse to accept coins as payment in Arunachal Pradesh. This is despite the fact that coins are legal tender. The authorities and bazaar committees should organise financial literacy programmes to educate shopkeepers and customers about the legitimacy of coins as a mode of payment.

articles.title: FioBit's Global Success: Proof of a Legit and Sustainable Mining Solution
articles.author: redazione web
articles.summary: As the cryptocurrency industry matures, users are placing increasing importance on the legitimacy of the currency they are using. Sydney, Australia, March 24, 2025, is the date of the launch of the first Bitcoin futures exchange.      Â
